Texts.Chs: 一组^orange;交流发电机^reset;能为你提供电力。你需要^green;木头或者煤^reset;来作为燃料。要把发电机连接到电器上，你首先需要开启物质操纵器上的^orange;接线功能^reset;，或者制作一把^orange;技工扳手^reset;。
Texts.Eng: An ^orange;Alternator^reset; provides you with power. To fuel it, you'll need ^green;wood or coal^reset;. To wire it to things, you'll first need to unlock ^orange;Wiring^reset; on your ^orange;Matter Manipulator^reset; or build a ^orange;Mechanic's Wrench^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 试着丢一些^orange;煤炭或者木头^reset; 到发电机里，以赋予你的^orange;交流发电机^reset;一点生机！
Texts.Eng: Try throwing some ^orange;Coal or Wood^reset; in there now to give your new ^orange;Alternator^reset; some life!
